text: tavada “oba, obagē særayaṭiya vīsi karanu” (yayi ohuṭa kiyanu læbīya. ē andamaṭama ohu eya vīsa kaḷa viṭa), eya viśāla nāgayek bavaṭa pat vī seḷavenu duṭu ohu (biya vī), ū ohu pasupasa noeḷavā siṭinu piṇisa, āpasu hærī nobalā divvēya. (ē avasthāvēdī ohuṭa) “ō mūsā! biya novī oba idiriyaṭa enu. niyata vaśayenma oba (sǣma ākārayakaṭama) ārakṣā karanu labana ayagen keneki”
